item.title: Is It Art if Everybody Hates It?
item.author: Laura Casas,
item.description: Van Gogh, while alive (1853-1890), only sold one painting. Though we all agree that The Starry Night (1889) and Sunflowers (1888) are artworks, people of the time detested or at least ignored these canvases. Thus, was it not art then and it is now?
